enhanced_description: Vantage Circle, through its flagship product Vantage Rewards, is dedicated to helping organizations build a winning work culture by bridging the gap between employers and employees. It aims to create an engaged, productive, and happier workforce. The platform, which has already been adopted by 700+ global organizations, including Fortune 500 companies, offers a mobile-friendly Rewards and Recognition platform to boost productivity and team performance. Additionally, it supercharges employee benefits with exclusive corporate offers, discounts, and cashback bonanzas on over 1000 global brands via Vantage Perks. The platform also includes simplified survey creation and management tools to drive engagement and elevate retention by understanding employee sentiment.
